Guus Lammers

A hero is not the one who never falls. A hero is the one that gets up, again and again, never losing sight of their dreams - Rock Lee

Social Media

Personal Projects

My Portfolio Website

Developed Using JavaScript

A SPA built using Vanilla JavaScript and Three.js to display my personal programming projects. Working on this project allowed me to refine my skills using JavaScript, Three.js, HTML, and CSS. This portfolio is being hosted using GitHub Pages.

Evolutionary Algorithm Visualizer

Developed Using Java

An interactive tool used to visualize an evolutionary algorithm implemented using the MVC design pattern. Working on this project allowed me to refine my skills using OOP, the MVC design pattern, and Java Swing components and event systems. By implementing this project using the MVC design pattern, I was able to decouple the view from the model, improving the code's organization and readability. This project also improved my knowledge of how evolutionary algorithms work.

Sorting Algorithm Visualizer

Developed Using Python

A sorting algorithm visualizer implemented using Tkinter and the MVC design pattern using a custom events system. The visualizer implements visualizations for selection sort, merge sort, quick sort, insertion sort, and cocktail sort. Working on this project allowed me to refine my skills using Tkinter, OOP, the MVC design pattern, and gave me the opportunity to create and implement my own custom event system.

Path Finder

Developed Using Python

An interactive visualization tool that visually compares path-finding algorithms. This tool allows the user to create the visualization setup by placing the start position, end position, and any obstacles. The visualizer implements visulizations for Dijkstra's, A*, and Best First Search path finding algorithms. Working on this project refined my knowledge of the underlying mechanics of path finding algorithms and the effects heuristics can have on the algorithms efficiency.

Cimex Bug Tracker

Developed Using Python Flask, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

A bug-tracking web application called Cimex that I created to track my projects. By working on this project I gained a thorough understanding of full stack web development, by designing a relational database, a RESTful API, and a visually aesthetic front-end. I implemented tbe application with complete authorization/authentication functionality.

2048

Developed Using Java

A simple implementation of the popular game 2048 implemented using the MVC design pattern. Working on this project allowed me to refine my skills using OOP, the MVC design pattern, and Java Swing components and event systems. By implementing this project using the MVC design pattern, I was able to decouple the view from the model, improving the code's organization and readability.

Snake

Developed Using Java

A simple snake game implemented using the MVC design pattern. Working on this project allowed me to refine my skills using OOP, the MVC design pattern, and Java Swing components and event systems. By implementing this project using the MVC design pattern, I was able to decouple the view from the model, improving the code's organization and readability.

Spiral Sort

Developed Using Python

A sorting algorithm visualizer implemented using Pygame that scatters and reconstructs a spiral. The visualizer implements visualizations for selection sort, merge sort, quick sort, insertion sort, cocktail sort, bubble sort, shell sort, and comb sort. Working on this project allowed me to refine my skills using Pygame and my knowledge of sorting algorithms.

Flappy Bird Clone

Developed Using Python

A clone of the popular game Flappy Bird implemented using Pygame. Working on this project introduced me to simple 2D game development using Pygame.

My Data Structure Libraries

Developed Using Python

Simple implementations of the following data structures: node, linked list, tree, queue, stack. These data structure implementations were used in some of my other projects. Working on this project refined my knowledge of the data structure listed above.

Sudoku GUI

Developed Using Python

A simple sudoku game implemented using Tkinter. The game can be solved by the user or with the implemented recursive back tracking algorithm.

Blackjack GUI

Developed Using Python

A simple blackjack game implemented using Tkinter.
